about.top: We are a small, growing company, which is why we can offer you quality products and services. We are engaged in the installation of electronics and hydraulics for agricultural and forestry
about.bottom: We offer high-quality welding, assembly and servicing of our products. We strive to make every piece of machinery perfect and meet your wishes and needs. Product innovation is our hallmark.

varjenje.t2: We weld steel, stainless steel, and structures.

montaza.t7: Installation of tanks and pumps for petroleum products for private customers

servis.t1: We are aware that only fast and professional assistance ensures efficient work with our products. That is why we also pay attention to after-sales cooperation.

lokacije_dela.t1: We are currently present in the following countries: Belgium, Netherlands, Germany, France, Slovenia, Croatia.

najem_bagrov.t2: Long or short term rental. Contact us for info.
